Energy Analytics Comps
======================

Welcome! Our COMPS project is currently split into two separate repositories: ::

   carleton-cs-energy-analytics
     |
     +-- energy-analytics-comps
     +-- marthas-dashboard

----------------------

   database/database_structure.md
   database/api.md
